title: Shop won't work
body:
Every time I open the shop I just get Galio and his 'Session Expired'

> An error is preventing your store request from being processed at this time. This issue can typically be resolved by closing and relogging into the League of Legends client. We apologize for the inconvenience, and thank you for your patience.
> 
> 
> If this problem persists, please contact us at support.riotgames.com

I relogged 3 times, everything else works. Anyone else having this issue?

Old client btw

EDIT: Apparently so. Its now got a client side notice. You guys work fast xD

replies.body: Looking into this now and investigating further.  We have a new post up on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, so be sure to bookmark it as we get more details.  Thanks for the report!
